projects.title: Multi-Class Segmentation of Flood Imagery
projects.bodyText:
- 🛰️ Built a multi-class semantic segmentation pipeline for analyzing satellite flood imagery using deep learning. 
 - 🌊 Identified and segmented key land cover types, including water, roads, buildings, and vegetation. 
 - 🧠 Leveraged the SegFormer transformer-based architecture for efficient and accurate pixel-wise classification. 
 - 🔧 Integrated data augmentation and training callbacks to improve generalization and training stability. 
 - 📈 Evaluated model performance using Dice score and visual comparison on high-resolution satellite images.

projects.title: Traffic Sign Classification
projects.bodyText:
- 🚦 Developed a traffic sign recognition system using the GTSRB dataset with over 40 sign classes. 
 - 🧠 Built and trained a custom Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) in TensorFlow for high classification accuracy. 
 - 📊 Assessed performance using test accuracy and visualized sample predictions for qualitative insights. 
 - 📁 Packaged the full pipeline with training scripts, evaluation tools, and model export for reproducibility.

projects.title: Sports Image Classification
projects.bodyText:
- 🏅 Built a sports image classifier using TensorFlow to recognize 10 distinct sports categories from photos. 
 - 🧠 Fine-tuned MobileNetV2 for transfer learning, achieving over 90% validation accuracy. 
 - 📊 Evaluated performance using validation accuracy and loss tracking during training. 
 - 🚀 Designed a clean, modular training pipeline with configurable parameters and exportable models.

projects.title: Document Scanner using OpenCV in C++
projects.bodyText:
- 📄 Developed a document scanner in C++ using OpenCV that **detects and extracts documents** from an image. 
 - 🧠 Applies **image processing techniques** like morphological operations, contour detection, and homography. 
 - 🔍 Outputs a flattened, top-down view of the document, simulating a real scanned copy.
